page.title: 18Parbold-Hilldale Chapel
page.content: There is only one place of worship in the Hilldale area:The Parbold- Evangelical Church.It was built of stone in 1889 as an Undenominational Mission Hall.It has 26 members and 4 non-members,approximately 18 are women and 12 are men,ranging from 20-80 years of age.Half of them are resident in Hilldale and north Parbold ,whilst the other half are from other areas around. Its minister is the Rev.John Palmer who lives in the manse provided by the church.This full time appointment of the minister is made by the members.The church is to become an associate member of the British Evangelical Council. Carved in stone by the gate are the words:ASK OF HIM AND HE WILL GIVE THEE LIVING WATER.It is the site of an old spring at Hilldale.
